comment: The class is hard, even the professor acknowledged it. She is willing to help and will answer quickly. I got an A because I asked her to help me with some assignments and she gladly met with me and explained everything in detail and also went over my assignments before I submitted it. You can do it if you work with the Professor.

Do not take her. The assignments are not difficult, but she does not grade based on her rubrics or directions. If you do NOT name a file correctly, you will earn an automatic zero. Very condescending and rude. If you ask for feedback on grades, etc. expect to be meet with aggression. She created a discouraging learning environment.

Absolutely the worst professor imaginable. DO NO TAKE HER. She is the most condescending and uncaring person i have ever met. She does not teach and has extremely high expectations. Save yourself the trouble and just don't take her. She needs to be reported more so that something is actually done.
Most difficult C that I have ever earned when I would have earned an A with any other TCOM professor.

professor is transphobic. other students turned in work 1/4 the quality of mine but I failed. she laughed at me when I told her my name on the first day and said "okay, good for you hon". worst semester of my life. do not take her under any circumstances, especially if you are lgbt.

For anyone looking to take this class in the future with her, I advise emailing and doing Teams calls with her constantly. She does not give clear instructions and expects everyone to know automatically what she wants. You can read the sample, instructions, and rubric and still earn a 70 even if you feel you worked hard.

I am not exaggerating when I say that I have never had a worse experience in a class then when I look Lisa. I should have known when I saw that over half of her students drop the class. She is in no way a fair grader. The most passive aggressive person ever, grades off of emotion, will be petty, will not help you in any way, the list goes on.

Don't be like me. Read the reviews and drop her if you haven't already. She refuses to help you. She's never clear on any assignment and literally failed me for lack of enthusiasm on papers. I don't know how someone hasn't reported her to the dean.

Teacher was not understanding and gave so many assignments it not even funny. took off points for a project because i didn't sound enthusiastic enough. 10 POINTS. would never take her again, thank god i passed already.

Horrible teacher. Gives assignments with a general outline but then grades with very specific criteria that were not stated. Getting an A on any writing assignment is almost impossible. Do not take her!!

It's like she adds grades you based off what she expected you to do instead of the instructions... and why is all the feedback so passive aggressive? I'm a straight A student and did not expect to fail this badly. You are NOT the problem.

Please, someone just report it at this point. I would join you.
rating_tags: Group projects--Lots of homework--Graded by few things

comment:
I feel sorry for teachers, but I can't ignore how awful and unfair this is.

1. She always gives "feedback" on things you miss because they literally AREN'T in the instructions. 
Be prepared for your grade to crash and burn and not be able to do anything about it.

2. You REALLY have to track the deadlines: they are NOT SUNDAYS.

3. Harsh grader!!!

for a technical communications teacher its wild that she can't create a set of instructions for students to follow to get an A. terrible teacher, knows nothing about the subject matter. course was a complete waste of time from day one. get it together lisa

Horrid. I wouldn't let her teach the alphabet let alone anything else. Constant passive aggressive comments. NO CLEAR INSTRUCTIONS FOR A TECHNICAL COMMUNICATOR. I believe she enjoys belittling her students. Easily the worst prof I've ever had in CORE class. no sympathy for students in rigorous courses. Only thing she taught me was TRUST ratemyprof.

"TAHOMA SIZE-12, SINGLE-SPACED"

Literally one of the most passive aggressive teachers of all time. Gets pissed off whenever a student asks a question in class. Takes off points for fun on any assignment. Will make it very obvious who she likes and hates. DO NOT TAKE HER IF POSSIBLE.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Same as everyone else said. Seriously, don't take her.
Very tough grader. She doesn't give clear instructions for her assignments.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Group projects--Graded by few things

comment: I didn't look up reviews for this professor before taking the course...BIG MISTAKE. Hopefully, you are reading this before the course and are not just trying to confirm your thoughts, emotions, and feelings. She is extremely condescending in her feedback after unfairly grading the extremely unnecessary assignment she is requiring. Don't do it.

I don't know where to start. Absolutely hideous and unpleasant time. She is a very strict grader, you'll have to guess the instructions on some assignments, and if you don't do it the way she was hoping you would do it, you are getting points deducted. There's so much more that i could say but I'm gonna leave it at that. Good luck.
Extremely tough grader, very critical, and impossible to get an A in the class.

Her feedback & grading criteria are definitely the worst I've faced in college. She will offer lots of material to help you out but don't expect her to give you any accommodation after the assignment's done. The textbook is free and online. This course under her teaching will make you feel like a bad writer, but it's not you, it's her.

She is okay, like any other basic teacher you would meet in high school. However, I don't like her because the way she gave her feedback feels disrespectful to me. I would never take her class again, and I would not recommend anyone to do so. You may have different experiences with her tho.

Worst professor. TCOM is a very easy class but the professor makes it so difficult. I ignored the ratings, Please don't be like me. RUN, She is by far the worst grader. She will find any reason to deduct points.  We do presentations and she expects us to present like Ben Shapiro, or some guy in a TED  TALK, If you don't she deducts points.
Terrible Professor. She is very strict and if you don't attend class regularly she will fail you.

I thought this was going to be an easy A class, only reason it wasn't is because of her. She is very sassy, to say it nicely, and comes off as rude. I've had little snarky backs-and-forths several times and she grades very harshly. It's mainly her attitude, just pass on her honestly. Not even worth it.
Madarchod is very tough grader. Would not recommend this class at all. Lots of homework has to be done as exactly as she wants or she will fail you. Won't even give you a chance to improvise on it.

I'm sure outside of KSU she might be a nice person to talk to but she is straight up mean during classes. She rushes through the lectures and when asked a question she will reply with a snarky "Oh, were you not paying attention?". She is a mix of Professor Trelawney with Dolores Umbridge, cooky but very harsh grader.

Worst class I have taken throughout college. Professor goes against her own rubric, and will find the slightest mistakes to dock points. I took this class because it was required, however I hope no one goes through the same mistake. She tries too hard to be funny. Get ready to hear a lot of talking and do absolutely no learning if you choose her.

PLEASE SEE THIS AND DO NOT SIGN UP FOR HER CLASS. I mistakenly took her class without looking for her ratings, and I regret doing so. She grades harshly for the dumbest things. I am a Mechanical Engineering major and I focus a lot on math classes. I had to take this class for credit and I hated it because of her. Take TCOM 2010, but not with her!!!
Do not take this professor. She is a tough grader, she expects you to write perfect. If you do not attend class for more than 2 days she drops your grade by one letter grade.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS PROFESSOR AT ALL. EXTREAMLY TOUGH GRADER. TAKES OFF 10% FOR SIMPLE ERROR OR TYPOS
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--So many papers--Tough grader

comment: She is an awful teacher. She's very rude and very pass aggressive. If you miss more than 2 days, she drops your grade by a whole letter grade. She grades very aggressively. It has to be exactly how she wants or its wrong. She takes lots of points off for late assignments even off by an hour. Do not take her as your professor.

Lisa Diamond is the worst teacher I have ever had in my life. Please do not do it to yourself and take her class. She is extremely rude to her students. She told students to withdraw because they will fail anyway, weeks before the class was over. She literally wants you to do badly in her class. All her assignments are unclear.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader

comment: Honestly the worst professor i have had since being at KSU she has a smart mouth and always tries to put students on blast. Terrible grader you can follow all the instructions and somehow still get a bad grade on an assignment I would not recommend her to anyone even if you need this class I would wait to take it with someone else do not take her!

Extremely hard grader. You could follow the assignment guidelines, of which there are many, and still do terrible. Can find flaws in absolutely everything you write. Her criticisms are borderline insults. All of that aside she's a very sweet, kind woman but an extremely tough grader.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Tough grader

comment: Tough grader that teaches techniques that are not actually used in business world. A pure academic with no real world experience. Never ever take this teacher. She likes to give group projects about Harry Potter.

It's a writing class so get ready for lots of papers. I think Professor Diamond is a fine teacher. The class material is just new. She's pretty flexible and available when needed. If you have a question, ask. Don't make any assumptions because she is a pretty tough grader. I was doing great in her class until the group projects :( so choose wisely.

Reduced a student's assignment's grade for a certain fault. I did the exact opposite of the fault, which should have been correct, yet she still reduced my grade for it. Impossible standards, very naggy, you could easily learn this course's content on your own.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: She is the worst professor I have ever seen in my life. If she does not like you she will do everything in her power to make you unsuccessful. I would have gotten an A in her class but I ended up with a C just because she gave me ridiculous 0's for work I have actually done. Please don't take her for your own sake and I hope she gets fired soon!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: The amount of work you get in this class is ridiculous. On top of that, her grading is strict beyond measures. If you have the option take an online class with a different professor, it will be much better. I had friends who did it, and made A's with ease. She is a really cool person, but it's not worth taking her.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--SO MANY PAPERS

comment: ESL, GPA-based-financial aid students should avoid her class or your self-esteem will slide to its bottom. She takes points of for nonsense reasons and never give out the correct samples for later reference, usually hold back .5 (69.5) to give a full letter grade. Her class is full of difficulties which you never overcome even how hard you try.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She takes attendance every day, grade drops after 3 absences.  A lot of assignments are based on being in class. She gives drafts and she gives a lot of feedback on them. If you don't get an "A" on the assignment you weren't trying hard enough. She is nice and cares about her students. Group Projects. Not a lot of textbook.  A few presentations.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Run. Gives at least 2-3 assignments a week, and takes this class way too seriously. Professor does not seem to realize that this is just a core class and her students have other major classes to worry about. Extremely tough grader and all over the place with her requirements. Swimming across the entire Pacific Ocean would be easier than this class.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Regularly threatens people with grades. Also has other questionable behavior. Would not recommend

Absolute garbage professor. She told me it's not your grades that matter, its how much you learn... like I don't need HOPE to keep going to school. She doesn't follow her own rubrics for grading. You'll be lucky to keep a B in this core class. Do future-you a favor and find another professor. You will hate your life (and GPA) if you take her.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: She started the semester off by telling us that she does not give A's.  First thought - "awesome..." I'll give her credit, though. She stuck by that. It doesn't matter how much time or effort you put into your assignments, you WILL NOT get an A.  A useless core class should not take more time than major reqs. Take another professor.

The hardest core class ever. She takes herself way to seriously. She will critique the smallest possible thing in your papers. If you miss more than 3 classes your grade plummets. Show up everyday do the work and you might make a B
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: Hardest teacher i've had in college didn't miss a single day of class. Grades assignments insanely hard. You do it how she wants it or not at all. Papers and assignments must be PERFECT just to get even a B. Your draft is never good, and your final is somehow worse than the draft in her eyes. madatory attendance with busy work. avoid at all cost!!!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Run. Diamond is the most anal teacher I have ever had. It is her way or you get a low grade. Even if you do what she says on your draft your final assignment will be a lower grade. Every class you are given a new assignment. Largest amount of work I've done for a class at Kennesaw. Takes herself way too seriously. Take the online option w/o her.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK
